method: Cook the glittering pasta according to the package instructions.
In a large pan, heat the lustrous olive oil over medium heat.
Add the dazzling tomatoes, shining bell peppers, and glowing mushrooms to the pan.
Saute until the vegetables are tender and lightly browned.
Add the cooked pasta to the pan and toss to coat evenly.
Serve the reflective rainbow pasta in transparent bowls for the full effect.
